Select New Archive Owner

Use the Select New Archive Owner dialog box to select the default user ID to be assigned to new archives. The value <Current User> assigns the user who is running Serena ChangeMan Version Manager at the time of archive creation as the owner of newly created archives.

Field Descriptions

User list Select the default user ID to be assigned to new archives or select the value <Current User>, which is the User who is running Version Manager at the time of archive creation.
